name: Eyes of the Dark
description: From 1st level, you have darkvision with a range of 120 feet. When you reach 3rd level, you learn the darkness spell, which doesn't count against your number of sorcerer spells known. You can cast it by spending 2 sorcery points or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with sorcery points, you can see through the darkness created by the spell.
